price: Ajaja fudhachuufi jecha gaariitu (isaaniif caala). Yeroo dhimmichi murtaa’e odoo Rabbitti dhugaa haasa’anii irra isaaniif caala ture.
arabic: طَاعَةٞ وَقَوۡلٞ مَّعۡرُوفٞۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ فَلَوۡ صَدَقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ṭāʿatun waqawlun maʿrūfun fa-idhā ʿazama al-amru falaw ṣadaqū al-laha lakāna khayran lahum
